title: I Will Trust in the Lord

lyrics.text:
I will trust in the Lord, I will trust in the Lord, I will trust in the Lord, till I die;
I will trust in the Lord, I will trust in the Lord, I will trust in the Lord, till I die.
Sister, will you trust...till you die
Brother, will you trust...till you die
Preacher, will you trust...till you die
